parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline job.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. You must specify this parameter together with the SortBy parameter. Valid values:

*   ASC: ascending order.
*   DESC: descending order. This is the default value.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: PipelineIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the pipelines. Multiple pipeline IDs are separated by commas (,). You can call [ListPipelines](~~438051~~) to obtain the ID of the pipeline.

parameters.name: PipelineRunId
parameters.description: The pipeline job ID. You can call [ListPipelineRuns](~~438042~~) to obtain the ID of the pipeline job.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field for sorting. Valid values:

*   PipelineId
*   UserId
*   ParentUserId
*   StartedAt
*   FinishedAt
*   WorkflowServiceId
*   Duration
*   GmtCreateTime
*   GmtModifiedTime

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline job source. You can view the ID of the pipeline job source on the pipeline details page. For more information, see [Manage pipelines](~~480625~~).

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the pipeline job source. Valid values:

*   UNKNOWN: If you do not specify this parameter, UNKNOWN is used as the default value.
*   SDK: The pipeline job is created by using an SDK.
*   DESIGNER: The pipeline job is created by using Machine Learning Designer.
*   M6: The pipeline job is created on other websites.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the pipeline jobs to be filtered. Valid values:

*   Initialized
*   Running
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
*   Terminated
*   Unknown
*   Skipped
*   Terminating

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
